appendix possible?
Release date
July 2024
Question asked
Is there the possibility to implement an ‘Appendix’ as another part of the sustainability statement
(mainly for the content index, EU datapoint table, etc.)?
Compilation of Explanations January—November 2024 Page 68 of 278
ESRS Implementation Q&A Platform – Compilation of Explanations January – November 2024
ESRS reference
ESRS 1 chapter 8.2; ESRS 2 paragraphs 56 and 119
